quotes.quote:
Somehow, the sea at night seems terribly dark. As if right beyond this point, the world might end.
But I'm not afraid. Because mornings without you are much scarier.
If reality is nothing more than what is in our mind, then what is the difference between this world and a dream?

Somehow, the sea at night seems terribly dark. As if right beyond this point, the world might end.
But I'm not afraid. Because mornings without you are much scarier.
